definition: to bank up with earth/to cultivate (lit. or fig.)/to train (people)

sentences.english: That class increased her accomplishments as a pianist.
sentences.chinese: 那个培训班增长了她作为钢琴师的技艺。

sentences.english: They train technical cadres in short courses.
sentences.chinese: 他们办短期培训班培养技术干部。

sentences.english: She received a certificate to show that she had attended the training course.
sentences.chinese: 她获得了证书说明她参加了培训班。

sentences.english: The workshop is co-organized by Tech-ex Dot Com Limited.
sentences.chinese: 本培训班由科讯网世界有限公司协助举办。

sentences.english: Do you need instructor-led training to pass the exams?
sentences.chinese: 要通过考试是否需要参加培训班？

sentences.english: The Xinjiang Buddhist Association holds regular training classes on Buddhist knowledge for clerical personnel.
sentences.chinese: 新疆佛教协会定期举办教职人员佛学知识培训班。

sentences.english: And I was doing some part-time Personal Training before and after work.
sentences.chinese: 我在上班前后会去上一些业余的个人培训班。

sentences.english: My teacher will spend her summer holidays in taking part in the teacher-training class.
sentences.chinese: 我们老师要利用暑假参加师资培训班。

sentences.english: Pinghu lindai Community Education Center to hold training courses green certificates.
sentences.chinese: 平湖林埭社区教育中心举办绿色证书培训班。

sentences.english: I have found the training class, ready to the rest of the time to study.
sentences.chinese: 自己曾经找到啦培训班，筹办歇息地时间就去进修。

sentences.english: I have to attend training courses for Graduate School Entrance Exams.
The writers in the class do exercises on hair salons and car washes.
sentences.chinese: 培训班上的学生以美发室和洗车房做练习写作。

sentences.english: Can I go to your computer class, too?
sentences.chinese: 我也能去参加计算机培训班？

sentences.english: Classmate: Yes, I also plan to take a training course for CPA.
sentences.chinese: 同学:是的，我也想去上一个注册会计师的培训班。

sentences.english: Liu Bin says his classes are most popular with families who bring children.
sentences.chinese: 柳斌说，他的培训班经常是全家带着孩子来参加的。

sentences.english: The two-day training course, near attend the training of 70 trainees.
sentences.chinese: 本次培训班为期两天，近70名学员参加培训。

definition: school begins/give a course/teach a subject
student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
to teach face to face/to instruct in person
to give guidance/to mentor/to counsel/to coach/to tutor
